text: Sylvestre Ilunga Ilunkamba (born 1947) is a Congolese politician. He was appointed as the Prime Minister of the Democratic Republic of the Congo in May 2019. He has had a long political career going back to the 1970s. Ilunga has also been the secretary general of Congo's national railway company.New DRC Prime Minister Sylvestre Ilunga is a political and professor. Radio France International, 21 May 2019DR Congo PM appointed under 'political agreement' with Kabila . Yahoo News, 20 May 2019DR Congo's Tshisekedi names new prime minister. France24, 20 May 2019 He is an ally of former President Joseph Kabila.Sylvestre Ilunga appointed as prime minister of DR Congo . Xinhua, 20 May 2019 He resigned in February 2021. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1947 births Category:Prime ministers of the Democratic Republic of the Congo
title: Sylvestre Ilunga
